duties_responsibilities.duty: Directly drive sales and profits for a multi-unit area of store locations.
Oversee and ensure that the overall condition of all stores comply with company standards.
Foster a coaching environment where team members want to excel and are recognized for their achievements.
Conduct regular store visits to ensure compliance with all company policies and procedures.
Engage with merchandising team to suggest ways to increase sales, expand markets, and promote business.
Plan and implement marketing campaigns and sales promotions.
Monitor all store activities to ensure exceptional customer service and operational excellence.
Build strong, sales-focused teams through recruiting, hiring, training, and coaching.
Coaches and supervises team members in all store responsibilities.
Ensures all human resources policies and procedures are timely and accurately administered.
Encourages and champions multi-unit store locations in providing friendly customer service.
Ensures store operations are current on product offerings and promotions.
Follows company dress code standards as applicable to Area Leaders.
Performs any other duties as needed for effective and efficient operations.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required, bachelor’s degree preferred
